title: The After Show with Nick Perdomo
itunes:title: The After Show with Nick Perdomo
description:
This week’s after show was pre-recorded to accommodate the hurricane in Florida. Our guest is Nick Perdomo and we discus:

  • How important are having perfect seeds?
  • What does the landscape of the company look like for the future?
  • Is there shade grown Nicaraguan tobacco on Perdomo’s horizon?
  • What is it like having Nick Perdomo III in a leadership role in the company?
    • Did he have to earn it?
    • Has he added any value?
  • What new Perdomo product can we expect to launch October 1st?

All this and more on the Roma Craft Tobac Aftershow!
